document.long_desc: COMPLAINT against Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC with Jury Demand (Filing fee $ 400 receipt number TPA040166) filed by Justin Lott. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A, # 2 Exhibit B, # 3 Civil Cover Sheet)(CTR) (Entered: 11/14/2016)
SUMMONS issued as to Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (CTR) (Entered: 11/14/2016)
SUMMONS issued as to Sanjay Patel. (CTR) (Entered: 11/14/2016)
RELATED CASE ORDER AND NOTICE of designation under Local Rule 3.05 - track 2. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 11/15/2016. (SAT) (Entered: 11/15/2016)

ORDER: This matter comes before the Court sua sponte. The Court takes this opportunity to address service of process as required by Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 4. See Order for details. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 11/15/2016. (SAT) (Entered: 11/15/2016)
CERTIFICATE of interested persons and corporate disclosure statement re 4 Related case order and track 2 notice by Justin Lott. (Owens, Gregory) (Entered: 11/29/2016)
NOTICE of pendency of related cases re 4 Related case order and track 2 notice per Local Rule 1.04(d) by Justin Lott. Related case(s): yes (Owens, Gregory) (Entered: 11/29/2016)
NOTICE of Paul O. Lopez, Esq. and Appearance by Megan Laing Janes on behalf of Purple Square Management Company, LLC (Janes, Megan) (Entered: 12/19/2016)
Unopposed MOTION for Extension of Time to File Response/Reply as to 1 Complaint by Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (Janes, Megan) (Entered: 12/19/2016)
CORPORATE Disclosure Statement by Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (Janes, Megan) (Entered: 12/19/2016)

ENDORSED ORDER granting Defendants' unopposed motion for extension of time to respond to the Complaint. (Doc. # 9 ). Responses due January 16, 2017. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 12/19/2016. (DMD) (Entered: 12/19/2016)

NOTICE of hearing: Case Management Hearing set for January 11, 2017, at 11:00 AM in Tampa Courtroom 14 B before Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington. Absent compelling circumstances and leave of Court, Lead Counsel must appear in person at the Case Management Hearing. Lead Counsel must be prepared to discuss the claims and defenses as well as any unique aspects of the case with the Court. This hearing is an investment of the Court's time and presents an opportunity for Counsel to meet the judge presiding over their case as well as present any issues that should be called to the Court's attention. Counsel are directed to meet and confer, in person or by telephone, and by January 4, 2017, file the completed Case Management Report. This document can be found on Judge Covington's page of the Court's website at www.flmd.uscourts.gov. Please be advised that the Court's Case Management Report Form is different from those used by other judges. (SAT) (Entered: 12/23/2016)
NOTICE of Appearance by Paul O. Lopez on behalf of Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC (Lopez, Paul) (Entered: 01/03/2017)
CASE MANAGEMENT REPORT. (Lopez, Paul) (Entered: 01/04/2017)

Unopposed MOTION to Appear Telephonically at the Case Management Hearing by Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (Lopez, Paul) Motions referred to Magistrate Judge Anthony E. Porcelli. (Entered: 01/04/2017)

CASE MANAGEMENT AND SCHEDULING ORDER: Final Pretrial Conference set for 12/14/2017 at 9:00 AM in Tampa Courtroom 14 B before Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington, Jury Trial set for the January 2018 trial term in Tampa Courtroom 14 B before Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington, Conduct mediation hearing by 7/17/2017. Lead counsel to coordinate dates. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 1/5/2017. (SAT) (Entered: 01/05/2017)

ENDORSED ORDER: In light of the Court's Case Management and Scheduling Order (Doc. # 16 ), defendants' motion to appear telephonically or reschedule hearing (Doc. # 15 ) is denied as moot. The Case Management Hearing scheduled for January 11, 2017, will be cancelled by separate notice. Regarding the dates set by the Case Management and Scheduling Order, the Court advises the parties that no continuances of the dispositive motions deadline, pretrial conference, or trial term will be granted. For other deadlines, the Court will consider granting short extensions of time on a case-by-case basis. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 1/5/2017. (DMD) (Entered: 01/05/2017)
NOTICE canceling Case Management Hearing scheduled for 1/11/2017 (SAT) (Entered: 01/05/2017)
NOTICE of mediation conference/hearing to be held on 3/20/2017 before Mark Hanley. (Owens, Gregory) (Entered: 01/12/2017)

(DOCUMENT TERMINATED; Incorrect event used; counsel contacted clerk's Office and will re-file) PROOF of service by Justin Lott (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A (document contained privacy information per counsel) # 2 Exhibit B)(Owens, Gregory) Modified on 1/12/2017 (AG). (Entered: 01/12/2017)

RETURN of service executed on 12/8/2016 and 12/12/2016 by Justin Lott as to Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A, # 2 Exhibit B)(Owens, Gregory) (Entered: 01/12/2017)

ORDER appointing Mark Hanley as mediator in this action. Mediation Conference set for March 20, 2017, at 10:00 AM. The Court directs that all counsel, parties, corporate representatives, and any other required claims professionals shall be present at the mediation conference with full authority to negotiate a settlement. The Court does not allow mediation by telephone or video conference. Personal attendance is required. See Local Rule 9.05(c). Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 1/13/2017. (DMD) (Entered: 01/13/2017)
Defendants' ANSWER and affirmative defenses to 1 Complaint with Jury Demand by Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC.(Janes, Megan) (Entered: 01/13/2017)
NOTICE of mediation conference/hearing to be held on March 29, 2017 at 10 a.m. before Mark Hanley. (Owens, Gregory) (Entered: 02/06/2017)

ORDER appointing Mark Hanley as mediator in this action. Mediation Conference set for March 29, 2017, at 10:00 AM. The Court directs that all counsel, parties, corporate representatives, and any other required claims professionals shall be present at the mediation conference with full authority to negotiate a settlement. The Court does not allow mediation by telephone or video conference. Personal attendance is required. See Local Rule 9.05(c). Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 2/7/2017. (DMD) (Entered: 02/07/2017)
NOTICE of settlement by Purple Square Management Company, LLC (Janes, Megan) (Entered: 03/14/2017)

ENDORSED ORDER: Lott has filed a notice of settlement, indicating that a settlement has been reached in this FLSA and ADA case. (Doc. # 26 ). The Court notes that, in the Eleventh Circuit, any settlement reached between the parties in an FLSA action is subject to judicial scrutiny of the terms of the settlement agreement. See Lynn's Food Stores, Inc. v. United States, 679 F.2d 1350, 1353 (11th Cir. 1982). Accordingly, the parties shall file their motion for Court approval of the settlement agreement by March 21, 2017. The parties should include information concerning the amount to be paid to Lott (including unpaid wages and liquidated damages), the payment of Lott's attorney's fees, and whether the issue of attorney's fees was negotiated separately from the amount to be paid to Lott for alleged FLSA violations. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 3/14/2017. (DMD) (Entered: 03/14/2017)

Joint MOTION for Settlement (for approval of) & to Dismiss Case With Prejudice by Sanjay Patel, Purple Square Management Company, LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A - Settlement Agreement)(Janes, Megan) (Entered: 03/21/2017)

ORDER: The parties' Joint Motion to Approve FLSA Settlement and Dismiss with Prejudice (Doc. # 28 ) is granted. The parties' settlement is approved. This case is dismissed with prejudice. The Clerk is directed to close the case. Signed by Judge Virginia M. Hernandez Covington on 3/22/2017. (DMD) (Entered: 03/22/2017)
